sentences.sContent: The implication is that you may need to track all changes to your process, the reason why you made each change, and when the change was made to conform to these regulations.
sentences.sContent_eng: The implication is that you may need to track all changes to your process, the reason why you made each change, and when the change was made to conform to these regulations.
sentences.sCn: 这含义是您可能需要追踪对您的过程进行的所有的变更，您为什么进行每个变更的原因，以及为了遵守这些法规，什么时候进行的变更。

words.tran: 纠缠（implicate的过去式和过去分词）
暗示；使牵连其中；含有…的意思
